info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 14 at 2:25AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring from the torrential heavy rains that fell late Thursday night through early Friday morning.
* WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 1056.0 feet, Significant agricultural flooding begins.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 1056.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:15 AM CDT Saturday was 1056.2 feet. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Sunday morning at 1030 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
